text:
I think I'll go for the vegetable tanmen.
Lately, I haven't been getting enough vegetables.

Well, if you had just asked,
I would've made Sakuya's portion together with mine~
That's really thoughtful of you, but...

It's nice of you to consider,
but adding one more serving isn't that much trouble.

You can tell me anytime~!
Vegetable-rich champon is my specialty dish!

Thank you.
Well then, I won't hesitate to ask next time.
──Now, may I take both of your orders?

Hehe, they all look delicious, so it's hard to decide...
I'll go with miso!
With a rich soup, it'll be really warming!
